entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main protagonist of the story. He is described as leaning against the window of the carriage, looking out at Hogwarts coming nearer.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends and a student at Hogwarts. He is mentioned as saying 'Blimey' when they arrive at the castle.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is another one of Harry's friends and a student at Hogwarts. She is mentioned alongside Ron and Neville as jumping down from their carriage.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is a friend of Harry's and a student at Hogwarts. He is mentioned alongside Ron and Hermione as jumping down from their carriage.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is the school that Harry, Ron, Hermione, and Neville attend. It is described as coming nearer through the gates, with its many lighted windows blurred behind a thick curtain of rain.

entities.name: triwizard tournament
entities.description: The Triwizard Tournament is an event that is mentioned in the chapter title and is likely to be taking place at Hogwarts.

relationships.description: Harry is located near Hogwarts, as he can see it coming nearer through the gates.
Ron is also located near Hogwarts, as he is with Harry and they are both looking at the castle.
Hermione is located near Hogwarts, as she is with Ron and Harry and they are all looking at the castle.
Neville is also located near Hogwarts, as he is with Ron, Hermione, and Harry and they are all looking at the castle.
